featured.text: A hundred million years ago, in the age of dinosaurs, redwoods were common in the forests of a much more moist and tropical North America.

other.text: It is spread through air and water in tropical areas.
A newly published study, however, revealed that rising temperatures are posing an 27 threat to the last tropical glaciers in Indonesia’s Papua region.
The severity of tropical diseases is also a matter of whether governments are capable—and willing— to defend their populations against infections.

definition.zh_def: 熱帶的；與熱帶地區有關的
definition.en_def: Relating to the tropics, the regions of the Earth between the Tropic of Cancer and the Tropic of Capricorn, characterized by a warm climate.
definition.example: The tropical rainforest is home to a diverse range of wildlife.
